oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: 41st Annual Richland Fire County Carnival (17667)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blue Ridge Quartet; Wells, Kitty; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Wright, Bobby; Tennessee Mountain Boys; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half-sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Blue Ridge Quartet and the Mark Four, Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright and the Tennessee Mountain Boys, and Bobby Wright, and more at the 41st Annual Richland Fire County Carnival on July 3, July 10, July 17, July 24, and July 31. Poster features metal photoplates of the bands. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21060/
